price: Kim bir günâh kazanırsa, onu ancak kendisi için kazanmış olur. Allah, her şeyi hakkıyla bilendir, hikmet sahibidir.
arabic: وَمَن يَكۡسِبۡ إِثۡمٗا فَإِنَّمَا يَكۡسِبُهُۥ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِهِۦۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waman yaksib ith'man fa-innamā yaksibuhu ʿalā nafsihi wakāna al-lahu ʿalīman ḥakīman
